question: The "Cristo Rei of Dili" statue is located in which country?
explanation: Cristo Rei of Dili statue, also known as Christ the King of Dili statue, is a statue of Jesus located in Dili, the capital city of East Timor/Timor-Leste. This statue was erected in 1996, unveiled by the then President of Indonesia Suharto, as a present to the people of Timor-Leste to commemorate the 20th anniversary of East Timor's integration into Indonesia. This statue is one of the main tourist attractions of Timor-Leste.
